body_html: Yes,I see your logic now! But in this python code string the name of variable is x_with_bias which means "x with something else", or "not only x." And, according to that string, x does not contains a 1 entry, it's x_with_bias. It's all just a matter of taste of course and not that important :)

body: Yes,I see your logic now! But in this python code string the name of variable is `x_with_bias` which means "x with something else", or "not only x." And, according to that string, x does not contains a 1 entry, it's `x_with_bias`. It's all just a matter of taste of course and not that important :)
